content: परि(री)वादः {@--1@} Blame, censure, detraction, abuse; अयमेव मयि प्रथमं परिवादरतः <ls>M. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 133.</ls> {@--2@} Scandal, stain, stigma; ill-repute; मा भूत्परीवादनवावतारः <ls>R. 5. 24</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 86</ls>; <ls>Mv. 5. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Charge, accusation; <ls>Mk. 3. 30.</ls> {@--4@} An instrument with which the lute is played.
